edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the logic of the game. It's methods are called by the application class which also updates the UI accordingly.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean attemptPlayerFlee()
      Attempts to move player position backwards by 1 based on the value of Player.FLEE_CHANCE
      boolean attemptShootEnemy()
      Reduces the player's ammo count and makes an attempt based on the probability edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#accuracy to remove hit points from the enemy based on the damage value edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#damage of the player's weapon.
      boolean attemptShootPlayer()
      Reduces the enemy's ammo count and makes an attempt based on the probability edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#accuracy to remove hit points from the player based on the damage value edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#damage of the enemy's weapon.
      boolean attemptSpawnEnemy()
      Attempts to spawn an Enemy based on the value of 0.15 with a random weapon generated by getRandomWeapon()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(int wepChoice)
        Initializes the player with starting weapon data.
        Parameters:
        wepChoice - the choice of starting weapon.

      • attemptSpawnEnemy

        public boolean attemptSpawnEnemy()
        Attempts to spawn an Enemy based on the value of 0.15 with a random weapon generated by getRandomWeapon()
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • attemptPlayerFlee

        public boolean attemptPlayerFlee()
        Attempts to move player position backwards by 1 based on the value of Player.FLEE_CHANCE
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • getRandomWeapon

        public Weapon getRandomWeapon()
        Attempts to generate a Shotgun based on the probability represented by 0.15. If unsuccessful, attempts to generate a Rifle based on the probability represented by 0.35. Finally if no weapon has been generated, generates a Pistol.
        Returns:
        the weapon generated

      • attemptShootEnemy

        public boolean attemptShootEnemy()
        Reduces the player's ammo count and makes an attempt based on the probability edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#accuracy to remove hit points from the enemy based on the damage value edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#damage of the player's weapon.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • attemptShootPlayer

        public boolean attemptShootPlayer()
        Reduces the enemy's ammo count and makes an attempt based on the probability edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#accuracy to remove hit points from the player based on the damage value edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Weapon#damage of the enemy's weapon.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • spawnItem

        public boolean spawnItem()
        Attempts to generate a Medpac and assign it to the variable based on the probability 0.3. If unsuccessful, generates ammo and assigns to instead.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • useItem

        public void useItem()
        Executes the method Item.consume(Actor) on player.

        public void movePlayerForward()
        Moves the player forward in the positive direction, bringing them closer to the end.
        Parameters:
